about_the_game:
SEASON 1
ADULT CONTENT DISCLOSURE
The developers describe the content as follows:

This game contains content that is not suitable for all ages or for viewing at work: nudity, sexual content. The game depicts sex graphically. All characters in the game are over 18 years old.

ABOUT THIS GAME
🍓Bubble Milf 🍓 is a visual novel that puts the keys to an intriguing mysterious world in your hands. While chasing the Mysterious Desires and understanding what is going on. You will be at the top.



Catch the clues, follow them, and while solving the events, you will also learn who you are with.
Spend time in the fun of this complex world.



This is a visual novel that puts the keys to an intriguing world in your hands. You have the opportunity to participate in a mysterious and interesting process, but be prepared for the challenges that set you to solve the mystery in the game that offers you difficult choices.

Features:
Ability to play with one hand.
Lots of explicit scenes with various girls
Fast-paced and intuitive gameplay
A fascinating story
Lots of Sexy Situations
Explicit content and mature themes are only suitable for players aged 18 and over

content_descriptors.notes:
The game content includes relationship scenes.
It includes male, female and futa style intercourse.
Green Goblins is a game featuring elven Fantasy.

The game content includes relationship scenes.
It includes male, female and futa style intercourse.

There are no drugs or alcohol.

name: Bubble Milf

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 11 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800GT or better
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 11 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800GT or better
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
